Game.Name: Densetsu no Stafy 3 (Japan) (Rev 1)
Game.plot: Densetsu no Stafy 3 is an Action game, developed by TOSE and published by Nintendo,which was released in Japan in 2004.Cheat: New LevelsYou must first complete the game at least once. Then after return to all the previous levels that you gain a vechicle at. You'll get an upgrade version of that vechicle along with new levels that requires you to use it.Cheat: Ending 2To view an alternative ending you must first complete the game. Then play the final level again to fight a new boss. Defeat it and you'll see an alternative endingCheat: Ending 2To view a second alternative ending you first must complete the game once. After collect all 40 red gems in each of the new 40 levels unlocked. Complete the final level to see the second alternative ending.
Game.Notes: A short time after Densetsu no Stafy 2, everything was calm and everyone including Stafy was happy again, until another severe thunderstorm came and shook Pufftop Palace. This time, it is more severe than the ones in the past. A lightning struikes the Magic Jar, destroys it and Ogura is free again.
